short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension provides a toggle to minimize unnecessary panes in gmail

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will add a toggle button in gmail that allows users to minimize (hide) unnecessary panes, allowing the content of an email to take the full screen of the Chrome browser.
